name: Elitez Group of Companies
description: Elitez Group is a regional human resource company founded in Singapore in 2010. Our Group provides reliable full-suite HR solutions for industries such as Healthcare, IT, Logistics, FMCG, Security and Government Services. Across this region, Elitez Group combines local experience and regional knowledge base to create a holistic value-add for our clients. Integrating global ESG (environment, social and governance) standards into our operations, we are your prime choice for regional HR partnership. Our mission to Fulfil Human Potential Without Borders indeed aid our clients to unleash new engines of growth across Southeast Asia. From 2017 till 2021, our Group has enjoyed an annual growth rate exceeding 42%. We attribute this to our consistent emphasis on ethics and entrepreneurial spirit that is keenly woven into our team’s youthful DNA. This same DNA has allowed Elitez Group and our valued clients to successfully navigate the COVID-19 pandemic.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Your Regional HR Partner
ShortDescription: Elitez Group is a regional human resource company founded in Singapore in 2010. Our Group provides reliable full-suite HR solutions for industries such as Healthcare, IT, Logistics, FMCG, Security and Government Services.

Highlights.name: Human Resource Solutions Provider
Highlights.description: Elitez is a human resource company that offers a variety of services to businesses [1]. These services include recruitment, payroll processing, and HR consultancy [1]. This means that Elitez can help businesses with all aspects of their HR needs, from finding and hiring qualified employees to managing payroll and complying with employment regulations.

Highlights.name: Streamlined Talent Acquisition
Highlights.description: Elitez can help businesses find and hire qualified employees by providing recruitment services [1]. This can include things like job posting, candidate screening, and interview scheduling. By using Elitez's recruitment services, businesses can save time and money on the hiring process.

Highlights.name: Ensured Compliance with HR Regulations
Highlights.description: Elitez can also help businesses comply with employment regulations by providing HR consultancy services [1]. This can include things like developing employee handbooks, managing employee benefits, and handling disciplinary issues. By complying with employment regulations, businesses can avoid costly fines and lawsuits.

enhanced_description: Elitez Group is a regional human resource company founded in Singapore in 2010, offering a full-suite of reliable HR solutions across Southeast Asia. Their services encompass Human Resource Consultancy & Advisory, Recruitment & Manpower Outsourcing, and Business Process Outsourcing. Elitez Group provides comprehensive support for businesses, including assistance with job posting, candidate screening, interview scheduling, payroll processing, and HR compliance. They help clients develop employee handbooks, manage employee benefits, and handle disciplinary issues, ensuring adherence to employment regulations and avoiding costly fines and lawsuits. The company integrates global ESG (environment, social and governance) standards into its operations, emphasizes ethics and entrepreneurial spirit, and experienced an annual growth rate exceeding 42% from 2017 to 2021. Elitez Group aims to help clients fulfill human potential and unleash new engines of growth across the region.

Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Reducing the cost of hiring qualified employees
Obtaining expert human resource consultancy and advisory
Streamlining talent acquisition processes (job posting, candidate screening, interview scheduling)
Ensuring compliance with HR regulations and employment laws
Developing and managing employee handbooks and benefits
